name: Laurenz Inky Adventure 2
description:
LAUREN'Z INKY ADVENTURE 2

This is a direct sequel to https://tomatogames.itch.io/laurenz-inky-adventure-visual-novel so if you haven't played that do it first. It's a fangame for a youtuber called LaurenzSide so if you're a fan of her feel free to check it out!

THE GAME CONTAINS SOME CONTENT THAT DOESN'T BELONG TO ME!
A detailed list of all these content can be found in the credits of the game!
